import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; const Square = ({ color, piece }) => { let pieceChar ; switch(piece.type) { case "rook": pieceChar = "♖" break; case "knight": pieceChar = "♘" break; case "bishop": pieceChar = "♗" break; case "king": pieceChar = "♕" break; case "queen": pieceChar = "♔" break; case "pawn": pieceChar = "♙" break; } let pieceColor = 64; for (let i = 1; i < pieceColor.length; i++) { } console.log("") // if(i % 2){ // let element = "white" // } else {element = "black"} return
{pieceChar}
